content:
Does someone understand why #8498 is failing CI with "Stack overflow detected. Aborting."?

I tried to merge master, but that didn't help. Also lake exe cache get fails locally with the same error, although at some point it didn't.
Oh, I'm stupid... There was a cyclic import (from moving things around between files). Sorry for the noise!
So your actual question is "why are cyclic imports not clearly reported as such?".
Between "how could I be so stupid?" and your reinterpretation, the latter looks rather more generous. :wink: But if there is a way to make the error message more informative, that's a bonus.
